title: It shall be accessable from common passage / staircase / lift etc
clause_text: It shall be accessable from common passage / staircase / lift etc. and shall be located preperabaly on ground or firest floor or incase if the ground / upper floor are used as stillt / podium / parking floors, then the floor next above the said parking floor / floors. Ladise toilet shall be provided with appropriate ventilation, lighting and drainage facilities. For this purpose, all ncecssary infrastructures should be provided in the room. The ownership shall vest with the society / association of owners if any.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
